title: Sidewall, 1835
inscribed: Stamped on verso "J.R." in frame.  Possibly Jules Riottot.
description: a) Imitation wood grain - possibly oak - in shades of brown and yellow with varnished surface; b) imitation burled wood grain in shades of brown, yellow, and green with varnished surface; c) imitation wood grain in shades of off-white and light brown with varnished surface. Faux bois.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1835.
1835. Hand-combed on machine-made paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-209-a/c.
